samples.name: Form - Single 3:5:4
samples.description: With a form you can easily layout (a) lists of properties (b) input fields. The form automatically adapts to the screen size. Even though the form is not part of sap.m it can and shall be used for building mobile user interfaces. This is an example of a single-column 3:5:4 layout (label:input:emptyspace) using the Form control

samples.name: Horizontal Layout
samples.description: The Horizontal Layout control is a simple way to align multiple controls horizontally. By default the contained controls are not wrapped. If you want more sophisticated layout options, consider Grid or Flex Box based layouts.

samples.name: Vertical Layout
samples.description: The Vertical Layout control is a simple way to align multiple controls vertically. If you want more sophisticated layout options, consider Grid or Flex Box based layouts.

samples.name: Simple Form - Single 3:5:4
samples.description: With a form you can easily layout (a) lists of properties (b) input fields. The form automatically adapts to the screen size. Even though the form is not part of sap.m it can and shall be used for building mobile user interfaces. This is an example of a single-column 3:5:4 layout (label:input:emptyspace) using the SimpleForm control

samples.name: Simple Form - Single 4:7:1
samples.description: With a form you can easily layout (a) lists of properties (b) input fields. The form automatically adapts to the screen size. Even though the form is not part of sap.m it can and shall be used for building mobile user interfaces. This is an example of a single-column 4:7:1 layout (label:input:emptyspace) using the SimpleForm control

samples.name: Simple Form - Dual 4:8:0
samples.description: With a form you can easily layout (a) lists of properties (b) input fields. The form automatically adapts to the screen size. Even though the form is not part of sap.m it can and shall be used for building mobile user interfaces. This is an example of a dual-column 4:8:0 layout (label:input:emptyspace) using the SimpleForm control

samples.name: Form With Toolbar
samples.description: Unfortunately the form control has no toolbar. As remedy you can put the form inside a Panel that carries the toolbar.

samples.name: Fix Flex - Vertical Direction
samples.description: Shows a FixFlex control with a vertical layout.

samples.name: Fix Flex - Horizontal Direction
samples.description: Shows a FixFlex control with a horizontal layout.

samples.name: Fix Flex - Fix container size
samples.description: Shows a FixFlex control where fixContentSize is set to a specific value(200px) and sap.m.scrollContainer is enabling vertical scrolling.

samples.name: Fix Flex - Nested
samples.description: Shows two FixFlex controls nested in a parent FixFlex control.

samples.name: Grid - Info Layout
samples.description: You can use the Grid control to make responsive table-free layouts; here we are using a default indent and span, and specifying the Small settings such that the image and text will stack on a small display.

samples.name: Grid - Tile-based Layout
samples.description: There is a lot of flexibility with the Grid control's content; here we are using Object List Items to represent products, with some being third/half-width, and others being half/full-width, depending on the available screen size.

samples.name: Grid - Task Display
samples.description: Using the Grid control, with appropriate values for the Large/Medium/Small span settings, you can set some elements to be fixed (like the Active, Inactive and Failed titles here) and some to flow.

samples.name: Splitter Layout
samples.description: Splitter where you can change contentAreas and their sizes live

samples.name: Splitter Layout - 2 areas
samples.description: Simple splitter example with two content areas

samples.name: Splitter Layout - 2 non-resizable areas
samples.description: Simple splitter example with two content areas that cannot be resized

samples.name: Splitter Layout - 3 areas
samples.description: Simple splitter example with with three content areas

samples.name: Nested Splitter Layouts - 7 Areas
samples.description: Nested Splitter example with 7 content areas
